message: Yep, just keep focusing on what's not important. While the inner city schools stay crime ridden, with terrible resources, and poverty grows. But by all means, please stay focused on the trivial things. Lol, only losers focus on what's not important. And that's exactly what traditional politicians and the media want you focused on. Trivial things instead of important things. That's why Liberals never make any progress for the poor. They keep them focused on things that have NOTHING to do with bettering their schools or communities. But don't let me rain down on your party. Please, continue.
